RQL_QUERY: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'aws-ec2-describe-security-groups' AND json.rule = (ipPermissions[*].fromPort equals 80 OR ipPermissions[*].toPort equals 80)
POLICY_DESCRIPTION: Detects AWS Security Groups with ingress rules allowing traffic on port 80 (HTTP).
SAVED_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Saved RQL query to find AWS Security Groups with ingress rules allowing traffic on port 80

RQL_QUERY: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'aws' AND api.name = 'aws-ec2-describe-instances' AND json.rule = networkInterfaces[*].association.publicIp exists
POLICY_NAME: AWS EC2 instance is assigned with public IP_custom
POLICY_DESCRIPTION: AWS EC2 instance is assigned with public IP_custom
SAVED_SEARCH_NAME: AWS EC2 instance is assigned with public IP_custom
SAVED_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: AWS EC2 instance is assigned with public IP_custom_desc
